div.p: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a clinical document type. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Document Type' subset with subset original id 44041000000135; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Correspondence document type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000391000000109.

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept in 999000391000000109
